formattedAddress: 66 Edgecombe Ave, New York, NY 10030, USA
adrFormatAddress: 66 Edgecombe Ave, New York, NY 10030, USA

originalText.text:
From the moment I stepped into MUSE -  I was captivated!
This unique fragrance experience engaged all of my senses. From the background music that perfectly complemented the fragrance journey, to the beautiful art installations; every aspect was thoughtfully curated to create a cohesive and memorable afternoon.
Kim made each fragrance a new adventure!  She is knowledgeable, attentive, and genuinely passionate about providing a top-notch sensory journey. And her fragrance recommendations were spot-on!
MUSE  is a must-visit for anyone seeking a unique, immersive, and thoroughly enjoyable beauty outing. It's truly something special.  A well-deserved 5 stars!

originalText.text: I can’t say enough about my wonderful experience with MUSE!!! Kim is so knowledgeable about the various fragrant notes to find a scent that is suited to your style. As a first time customer I am looking forward to my return visit!

text.text: I can’t say enough about my wonderful experience with MUSE!!! Kim is so knowledgeable about the various fragrant notes to find a scent that is suited to your style. As a first time customer I am looking forward to my return visit!

originalText.text: MUSE is basically the hidden treasure chest of Harlem! Kim is like the Willy Wonka of fragrances—knowledgeable, passionate, and ready to whisk you away on a scent-sational journey. I've been initiated into the mysterious world of complex fragrances, and now I'm strutting around like a fragrant aficionado. The vibe of the place is like a warm hug, making the whole experience feel like a cozy adventure. #ScentSationalGem #MUSEMagic #HarlemTreasures

originalText.text:
I recently had the pleasure of visiting Muse, and I must say, it was an exceptional experience. I want to take a moment to express my appreciation for Kimberly, who went above and beyond to make the consultation memorable.

First and foremost, Kimberly's expertise in the various fragrance brands was truly impressive. She had extensive knowledge of the different scents and was able to guide me through the options with ease. Her deep understanding of the ingredients and background behind each fragrance added an extra layer of depth to the consultation. Despite my numerous questions, she never made me feel rushed or pressured.

The relaxed environment of the consultation was another aspect that made the experience great. There was absolutely no pressure to buy like other shopping experiences I had, which allowed me to explore the fragrances at my own pace. I appreciated the freedom to take my time and make informed decisions without feeling coerced.

Lastly, Kimberly encouraged me to step out of my comfort zone and be open-minded during the selection process. Her gentle reminder was invaluable, as it pushed me to try fragrances I may not have considered otherwise.

In conclusion, I highly recommend Muse to anyone looking for a unique experience and wanting to try fragrances from around the world!

originalText.text: You have to experience MUSE. My bestie surprised me with this event for my birthday and it didn't disappoint. Kimberly has created an amazing experience for fragrance lover's and those who are new to the fragrance world. She was kind, warm, fun, and an amazing hostess. Kimberly was extremely knowledgeable about fragrance. She gave us suggestions on where to shop and visit to expand and explore or taste domestic and international scents. I highly recommend booking this experience with MUSE, you won't regret it.
